resources.string: The usage of accessibility service for reading Question and Options from the app screen when these are appear to users.\n

Works with Version LOCO 2.1.9 or older version ,Qureka latest version, HQ 1.6.2,The Question, WE Show, BrainBazzi ,MobShow, JusPlay , Swoo, SWAG IQ, KO Trivia 
Give necessary permission to this app and then Press "START" Button
Click on ADVANCE button to do Wiki search
If simple search is fails it do WIKI search automatically
When primary search fails then app will use alternative way to find answer
